goals__remit: The Quoted Companies Alliance (QCA) is the independent membership organisation that champions the interests of small and mid-size quoted companies. We define small and mid-size quoted companies as those 1,600+ quoted companies outside the FTSE 350 (including those on AIM and NEX Exchange), representing 76% of UK quoted companies.
